name: Miner Malfunctions
description:
Hello! Welcome to my Ludum Dare 47 Entry.

Instructions

W A S D to move

SPACE to fire a flare

HOLD E to drill ores

TAP E to drop of ores

Drill seven valuable blue ores and drop them off in the center before the mothership blows the map to pieces!

Credits

MUSIC by Matt Caven

MODELING by Blake Caven
